website_summaries.verdict: This set isn't for the traditionalist, but for those who want pint-sized beer glasses that are built to chill and last, it is definitely worth considering.
pros: Generates enthusiasm among those who get tired of broken glasses, as the stainless steel construction is nearly indestructible
Easy to chill for cold brews
cons: Rusting is possible, so thorough drying after using them is recommended
Some individuals may detect a metal taste

customer_reviews.title: I've had guests hand me back the cup saying it was dirty, which just makes me look like a bad ...
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to replace all our cups with these since we are now totally converted, however the lack of insulation kind of negates the whole point of these cups. They sweat profusely and ice melts as fast as it does with regular cups. I asked the seller if they were dishwasher safe, was told yes- but after a couple of rounds in the dishwasher these are starting to develop a brownish-rust color on the bottom inside of the cup. I've had guests hand me back the cup saying it was dirty, which just makes me look like a bad hostess.
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: ROLLED RIMS LEAK
customer_reviews.text: So, if you submerge these in water or put them in the dishwasher, the rolled rims leak. They are rather thin stainless with not a lot of weight to stand on their own, but are fine when filled. The size is fine. The rim leaking old water is not fine. You can shake them, dry them, and put them away. 2 days later you get one out of the cupboard and before you fill it, you notice the water (or whatever) leaking out of the rim. Should I caulk them or send them back?
customer_reviews.author: E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!  No more broken cups.
customer_reviews.text: No more broken cups or chemicals in my water! The actual cups seem smaller than they are due to shape, but hold more than glass cups that appear larger. Plus I can fit a whole bunch in one stack in the cupboard. Edited to reduce my stars. There are still chemicals in my water. Something about the design of this cup holds dish soap if not rinsed and drained just properly. We currently handwash. It catches in the rounded lip and is nasty. This is supposed to be simple not more time consuming unlike my other stainless cups.
customer_reviews.author: CRYSTAL

customer_reviews.title: ounce advertising is wrong
customer_reviews.text: just got these and I immediatly noticed they seem small. I used a measuring cup to check the size. these will only hold about 14oz filled to top so for normal use, it fills to about 12oz. total false advertising. they seem sturdy and smooth. I will be keeping them because it not a bad deal but in future I would get a bigger cup.
customer_reviews.author: h

customer_reviews.title: Rusted in a week
customer_reviews.text: We have a couple of old stainless steel glasses my family bought about 40 years ago in perfect shape. I wanted to buy a new set for the family to use to replace the plastic set. This is nowhere near as good as our old steel glasses. It's not a smooth finish and it rusted within a week of using. Not acceptable. I'm going to see if I can return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are a hit around the house. After the kids and wife broke all my beer brand pint glasses, I decided we needed non glass alternative, enter these. My wife loves them, the kids seem to as well. They'd certainly work for camping or whatever, but they're also just great for around the house usage.
customer_reviews.author: Vargr

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Like these a lot, bought to use in bathroom as they match the fixtures. Wish they were a bit heavier material however, so they didn't get hot so quick when using w/ hot water. But still, like the look and feel, would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: jimb

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really wish I had read the reviews prior to purchase. After using these cups for 2 days, I have rust on the rim. Emailed the company to see if they will resolve the issue or issue a refund. So disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Eric VanHevel

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice inexpensive set of drinkware. They keep things cold as expected (Can't give an exact amount of time because I was drinking out of it but I can attest it was about 1 hour when I finished my drink and it was still cold). We purchased these to replace beer glasses because they kept getting broken. They hold a full can of beer. I gave 4 stars because the cups get super cold on the outside and I wish there was a grip or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit thinner than I was expecting but still worth it. Easy to clean and keeps drinks hot or cold for longer than the normal glass and plastic cups I use. Great for mixed drinks especially if you freeze the cups before making your drink. Definitely going to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: You must buy these if you have kids.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler grabbed one as I pulled them out of the box and threw it on the tile. IT'S INDESTRUCTIBLE!! Also insulates great and is pleasant to drink from. Definitely a favorite of my countless Amazon purchases. I'll be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: HGP

customer_reviews.title: Finally Indestructible Tumblers for Klutzy People
customer_reviews.text: We can't have nice stuff. I give up, we break glass glasses, we even break plastic tumblers. I bought these, they are nice to hold. Drinks stay cold. I like the finished rim. But guess what they are nice stuff. They look great on our table. They stack nicely. They take up very little room in the cupboard, which is good because I have a small kitchen. I will be ordering more so I have a set of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: Just wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these cups. Not big on stainless steel bottles, but these cups are awesome...they really keep the drinks colder than plastic and glass too.
customer_reviews.author: Milkcrate USA

customer_reviews.title: I like them
customer_reviews.text: Upside: My grandkids can't break them! For that matter neither can Hubby. No plastic taste or smell. (I don't have to throw them out if juice or milk was left in them overnight) If you have small spaces these are the bomb because they nest so well. They take up a lot less room in your cupboard. Downside: If you put boiling water in the cups you will need a hot pad because they are too hot to hold.
customer_reviews.author: PF

customer_reviews.title: nice beverage glasses
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable. Nice quality. fit together so take up very little space. Would buy again if needed. Get hot if you put hot beverages in them but that is to be expected as they are for chilled beverages. Not thermal so they will sweat. Great for camping and easy to clean. Good for every day use too. Don't break when my husband leaves them sitting on the truck bumper and drives off!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Are they availablr
customer_reviews.text: My dad so.sometimes falls asleep with a drink in hand. At least now it's just liquid to pick up and no glass. I think I want spill proof lids for this size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality and shape of the glasses. I bought some for myself and went back and bought a few more for my mom. you cant beat the price for the quality you're getting with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and durable

They easily rinse clean and stack nicely together.

customer_reviews.title: I love drinking out of these and they are very well ...

Only complaint is they're a bit lightweight, but that's more of a preference thing. We still love them so much that we'll be ordering more!

To my delight, they held up perfectly, made the perfect vase shape. Good quality stainless!

product_meta.title: FineDine Premium Grade Stainless Steel Pint Cups Water Tumblers (5 Piece) Unbreakable, Stackable, Brushed Metal Drinking Glasses, Chilling Beer Glasses, for Travel, Outdoor, Camping, Everyday, 16 Oz
feature_bullets: 5 piece set of premium stainless steel drinking glasses for everyday household and outdoor use. These durable matte stainless steel cups are great for serving chilled water, juices, iced tea, milk, and even beer and cocktails!

Our unbreakable kid proof cups are made of 18/8 gauge high quality brushed stainless steel. The water tumblers feature a rolled rim for added durability and a comfortable sip every time. These heavy-duty metal cups resist rust and dents and won’t show unsightly fingerprints.

The metal pint cups' rugged construction makes them excellent for pool and beachside and for taking along on camping, boating, and hunting trips! Our space saving steel cups are nestable, conserving cabinet storage space and for conveniently transporting it in lunch bags and picnic baskets!

Beverages taste fresher in stainless steel glasses rather than plastic tumblers! Stainless steel is free of BPA and harmful toxins. This, coupled with the stainless cups heavy duty nature, makes them perfect for kids and health conscious consumers!

This set makes an excellent Christmas, holiday, and special occasion gift! The metal drinking glasses wash easily by hand and are dishwasher safe! Dimensions: 4 ⅞” height, 3 ¼” diameter with a 16 ounce capacity.
